preference.name: MELBChartDnDTargetParentTypes
preference.preference_description: Specifies the types of parent objects to which processes or operations can be dropped in the line balancing chart.This can include processes as well as process area types. Valid Values: Internal names of MEProcess or any of its subtypes.Internal names of Mfg0MEProcArea or any of its subtypes.
